ModuleTitle: Maths, Computational & Statistical Sci Capstone Project
ModuleDescription: The Maths, Computational & Statistical Science (MCS) Capstone Project is a year-long 10-MC module, straddling two semesters that students in the MCS major must complete in order to graduate. It allows students the opportunity to pursue, in depth, an advanced project of their own choosing, under the guidance of a faculty supervisor. The Capstone is intended to: • give students the opportunity to work independently; • encourage students to develop and exhibit aspects of their ability that may not be revealed by course work or a written examination; • foster skills and attributes that will be of continuing usefulness in their later career.
Prerequisite: Completion of all Year 1 and 2 Common Curriculum Modules
